document_data.mainbody:
Skitter was the giant spider companion of the ranger Kuldail Ukien during the late 15 century DR.
Skitter served its master Kuldail as he defended Druids Deep for the insane druid Halsaime. Kuldail and the other druids and rangers of the grove had been subverted by the strange magical powers of Halsaimes staff, which turned them into single-minded soldiers against the world.
